description: Thanatos is the god of Death and the twin brother of Hypnos. Their only differences are Thanatos` silver hair and eyes, as well as a pentagram star on his forehead. He is able to give a fraction of his own power to other Specters, and has direct command over Nasu Veronica, who shares the pentagram on his forehead. Using Tartarus` Phobia, Thanatos can summon a large number of souls that attacks the enemy and with Terrible Providence, Thanatos creates a powerful energy blast capable of destroying even the Gold Cloths. In his fight against Cancer Manigoldo and the Pope Sage, his host body is killed by Manigoldo, and his soul sealed by Sage inside a Holy Coffer empowered by Athena.
name: Shi o Tsukasadoru Kami Thanatos
